title: RE-start after update - language settings
content:
I've just updated my phone to newest software version from February 5th.
I did this as there were issues with the classic lower return button.
However, if I want to change the language now the phone restarts every time. Doesn't matter what move I make it re-starts. 
What could be this problem and how to solve it? 
Already re-started in safe mode but also doesn't change anything
